titles: The lives of sundry notorious villains, memorable for their base and abominable actions together with a novel as it really happened at Roan in France.
author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
publisher: Printed for the author, and sold by Sam. Crouch ...,
notes: Written by Aphra Behn. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
